LNPayDescriptionText1: Prisijunkite prie LNPay paskyros, kad galėtumėte prijungti piniginę prie Podverse adresu
LNPayDescriptionText2: Vėliau pridėkite viešąjį LNPay API raktą. Raskite savo API raktą apsilankę
LNPayDescriptionText3:
Jis naudojamas norint sugeneruoti specifinę Podverse piniginę jūsų LPay paskyroje, iš kurios galėsite siųsti Sats į podcast'us.

Kai piniginė bus sukurta, perkelkite į ją šiek tiek Sats, kad galėtumėte pastiprinti savo mėgstamus internetinius transliuotojus!
 
Jei norite naudoti esamą piniginę, kartu su Piniginės administratoriaus raktu galite įvesti ir Piniginės ID.
Limit the number of downloaded episodes: Pagal numatytuosius nustatymus apribokite kiekvienos tinklalaidės atsisiųstų epizodų skaičių
Viršijus atsisiuntimo limitą, seniausia serija bus automatiškai ištrinta.
Listen Tracking subtext: Klausymosi stebėjimas skaičiuoja jus populiarumo reitinguose.
Name: Vardas
Offline mode can save battery life and i: Režimas neprisijungus gali sutaupyti akumuliatoriaus veikimo laiką ir pagerinti našumą vietose, kuriose yra prastas ryšys.
Only with Link means only people who: "Tik su nuoroda" reiškia, kad žmonėms reikia klipo nuorodos, kad galėtų jį paleisti. Šie klipai nebus automatiškai rodomi Podverse sąraše Vieša. Kurkite viešus klipus naudodami Podverse premium.

Please retry processing or contact suppo: Bandykite apdoroti dar kartą (nebūsite vėl apmokestinti) arba susisiekite su palaikymo komanda.
Please verify your email address to logi: Norėdami prisijungti, patvirtinkite savo el. pašto adresą.
Podcast supports value-for-value donatio: Ši tinklalaidė palaiko vertė-už-vertę paramą. Nustatykite savo Bitcoin piniginę, kad pradėtumėte aukoti tinklalaidžių kūrėjams iš šios programos

TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText1: Podverse lets users optionally enable anonymized tracking within the app. We use this tracking info to help determine which content on the site (including podcasts, episodes, and clips) are most popular.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText2: The tracking software we use is called Matomo, and it is a free and open source analytics platform. We host an instance of Matomo, so all tracking data is hosted on our servers, and individual user tracking data will never be sold to or shared with 3rd parties.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText3: All of our tracking data is anonymized by obscuring the IP address by 2 bytes, which means IP addresses are obscured and then saved on our server with the format 192.168.xxx.xxx.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText4: To further protect user anonymity, we do not use session IDs to track users across multiple visits. Likewise, to further protect anonymity, we do not use cookie-based tracking on our website.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText5: While we use Matomo tracking data to help us determine what content is most popular on Podverse, users should keep in mind that these popularity metrics are easy to manipulate, and may not accurately reflect the popularity of content.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingTextFD: Podverse for F-Droid ***does not*** contain tracking software, but tracking software is present on the Podverse website and optionally in the iOS and Android versions.
TermsOfServiceScreenText1: Podverse will never sell or share private user data.
TermsOfServiceScreenText2: Podverse will never put advertisements next to or within a podcast's content without that podcast's permission.
TermsOfServiceScreenText3: All audio and video files found on podverse.fm load from the podcaster's own public server. We do not host podcast audio or video files ourselves.
TermsOfServiceScreenText4: All clips hosted on podverse.fm are crowd-sourced and unofficial, unless otherwise noted by the podcaster.
TermsOfServiceScreenText5: Clips load within the full episode's media file, so the user always has access to the full recording.
TermsOfServiceScreenText6: Podverse hosts Podcast Funding Links and content from third-party podcast feeds and sites. These have their own independent privacy policies, and we have no responsibility for their content or activities.
TermsOfServicesScreenText7: Podverse stores credentials for podcasts that require authentication on the device secure storage chip. Podverse does not use or store this data in any way other than to allow subscribing to podcast feeds that require authentication. This data does not get stored on any Podverse servers.
The email may go to your Spam folder: The email may go to your Spam folder.
The start time must be before the end ti: The start time must be before the end time.
The start time must be greater than 0 if: The start time must be greater than 0 if no end time is provided.

error_boundary_description: Pardon this interruption. We're on it. In the meantime, feel free to listen on.
support free and open source software: support free and open source software
sync your queue on all devices: sync your queue to all your devices
sync your subscriptions on all devices: sync your subscriptions to all your devices
trackingTermsText2: Popularity rankings on Podverse are sorted by total unique listeners respective content.
trackingTermsText3: Turn on tracking for your listens to count in these rankings.
trackingTermsText4: All the data we track is anonymized and hosted only on Podverse servers.
trackingTermsText5: We will never sell or share private tracking data.
value_tag_consent_checkbox_text: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions
value_tag_consent_text_1: This is an experimental feature. To continue you must accept all the following terms:
value_tag_consent_text_2: – Podverse does not hold any responsibility for lost or corrupted funds and transactions.
value_tag_consent_text_3: – LNPay account and wallet access keys are stored on the device secure storage. Podverse only saves and uses these keys for LNPay transactions. If a device is compromised, lost or stolen, Podverse cannot prevent unauthorized use of your wallets.
value_tag_consent_text_4: – Lightning Network fees are auto-added to each transaction and are calculated by the Lightning Network. Podverse cannot predict transaction fees. The fees are charged separately and in addition to your donation.
value_tag_preview_boost: Boost: Send a donation immediately to the podcaster
value_tag_preview_stream: Stream: Send a donation per minute of listening time to a podcast
value_tag_preview_title: Send Bitcoin to your favorite podcasters
